summary: LOCKING MECHANISM TO LOCK AND LOOSEN THE HARNESS STRAPS PULLED OUT OF THE SEAT WHEN ATTEMPTING TO TIGHTEN THE STRAPS.  TWICE PARENTS HAVE RETURNED WITH THE SAME PROBLEM.  THIS HAPPENED ON A CAR SEAT SPECIALTY/BASIC CONVERTIBLE CAR SEAT.  NHTSA DOES NOT OFFER THIS COMPANY AS AN OPTION FOR MAKE/MODEL.     *TT
